name: JuggalOS-Ubuntu
short_description: Features MATE Desktop with default MATE-Black high-contrast theme, large font (great for low-vision users... or to give props to Juggalos) in place of GNOME 3, Disk- and memory-hogging Zeitgeist daemon removed from installer... adds a few other packages for accessibility, and a few other tweaks; otherwise stock Ubuntu saucy re-spun with Customizer
summary: Customized Ubuntu distro without Zeitgeist and GNOME
